content.body: Does removing a content attribute set an element's enumerated attr back to the default state? I.e., if there's an image whose loading=lazy, and I removeAttribute('loading'), does https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/embedded-content.html#the-img-element:attr-img-loading-2 get triggered?
I think it does, but want to be sure
domfarolino: it changes it to the missing value default state
